pageContext.claim: “Last year, sanctuary cities of North Carolina released more than 500 criminal aliens thanks to your governor, charged or convicted of heinous crimes, including rape and murder. Think of it, in North Carolina, think of it, it's not even believable.”
pageContext.analysis: Eighteen of the 487 people released with ICE detainers in North Carolina in Fiscal 2019 faced charges of sexual assault or homicide, according to data from Immigration Customs Enforcement.
